column1: Users can display the list of books by selecting "Books".
Users can filter books by a valid publishing date range.
Users cannot filter books if the date range input is invalid.
Users cannot filter books if the date range input is left empty.
Users successfully navigate to the next page of books using the "Next" button.
Users successfully navigate to a specific page of books using page numbers.
Users cannot navigate to the next page of books when on the last page.
Users cannot navigate to a previous page of books when on the first page.
Users see an empty list when there are no books to display.
Users can view a filtered list of books within a valid date range.
